info.title: Rapidata Rapid API
info.description: The API for the Rapidata Rapid service

post.summary: Rejects a completed rapid, marking its results as invalid.
post.description: The rapid must be in the Done state. Rejection propagates staleness to dependent entities.

parameters.name: rapidId
parameters.description: The identifier of the rapid to reject.

get.summary: Allows querying all rapids that have been flagged.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The request to use to filter, sort and page the results

get.summary: Gets all responses for a given rapid.

parameters.name: rapidId
parameters.description: The rapid to get the responses for.

get.summary: A public endpoint to query the most recent responses globally

post.summary: Creates a new Demographic Rapid with JSON body.

requestBody.description: The model containing the demographic rapid.

patch.summary: Updates the validation information of a Rapid.

parameters.name: rapidId
parameters.description: The id of the rapid to update

post.summary:
Unflags a flagged rapid.
 This will add the rapid back to the active labeling pool and prevent it from being flagged again.

parameters.name: rapidId
parameters.description: The id of the rapid to unflag

get.summary: Queries rapids that are potentially eligible for validation set creation.
Validates that the rapids associated with the current user are active.

post.summary: Submits a response for a Rapid.

requestBody.description: The model containing the user guess.

post.summary: Skips a Rapid for the user.

requestBody.description: The model containing the Rapid to skip.

post.summary: Used to report an issue with a rapid.

get.summary: Inspects a report's dump. Can be used to restore zustand state or anything alike.

key.description: The identifier of the demographic classification.

featureFlags.description: Optional feature flags to apply to the rapid.

asset.description: An optional asset to associate with the rapid.

context.description: An optional text context to show to the user.

contextAsset.description: An optional asset to use as context to show to the user.

CreateDemographicRapidModel.description: The model for creating a demographic rapid.

QueryValidationRapidEligibilityModel_Que.description: The Query Model specific to the validation rapid eligibility query.

RapidIssue.description: A streamlined enum representing common issues.

sessionIndex.description: The index of the session when the result was submitted.

RapidResultModel.description: The model for a Rapid result.

rapidId.description: The ID of the Rapid that was skipped.

sessionIndex.description: The index of the session when the Rapid was skipped.

RapidSkippedModel.description: The model for a Rapid skipped.

message.description: An optional message typed by the user.

dump.description: A dump, that the frontend defines and can read again.

source.description: An optional identifier where the report originated from.

ReportModel.description: The model for reporting an issue with a rapid.

truth.description: The truth for the validation rapid.

explanation.description: The optional explanation that will be shown to the user when answering wrong.

context.description: An optional text context that will be shown to the user.

contextAsset.description: An optional asset that will be used as context to show to the user.

randomCorrectProbability.description: The probability that if the user answers at random that he'll be correct.

UpdateValidationRapidModel.description: The model for updating a validation rapid.

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme

OAuth2.description: OAuth2 authorization header using the Bearer scheme
